channel.title: Pk prestiges
channel.description:
ok can i do prestige on my pk serverlike so when all your combat stats attack, range, mage, prayer, strength,etc... you do the command ::prestige and it resets all your combat skills then makes you prestige 1 and then when you yell it says [1]Name-"I just prestiged"
how would i do all this like lol can you give me all the tuts to do this :) or explain thanks :)))

item.title: Pk prestiges
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

It would involve something like: c2.sendMessage("Bla bla bla"); Where ever you put it for you to prestige. Here are some examples:

From an Npc:
In ClickingButtons.java in whatever case and dialogueAction you used.

Command:
In Commands.java, just put it under all the stuff for you to prestige.

Object:
In ActionHandler.java, close to what you would do in ClickingButtons.java but no dialogueActions.

Read full topic
